name: L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Anti-Aging Eye Cream Treatment, with Pro Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C to Reduce Wrinkles, De-puff and Brighten Skin, 0.5 fl. oz.
about_this_item: Revitalift Triple Power Eye Treatment visibly reduces wrinkles, de-puffs and brightens skin around the eye area
This anti-aging eye cream has been formulated with 3 of the top derm-recommended ingredients - Pro-Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C
After use, skin feels softer, smoother and is hydrated for 24 hours - After 1 week, it visibly reduces wrinkles, firms and brightens skin
Our luxurious texture with a metal tip applicator absorbs quickly, is non-greasy and does not clog pores - Paraben free, Mineral Oil free, Allergy tested, Fragrance Free
Revitalift Triple Power Eye Treatment packaging and formula may vary - Always read the ingredient list on the product label before use

title: Verified Purchase
content: I purchased my L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Anti-Aging Eye Cream Treatment with Pro Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C from my Amazon wishlist last year. Ive used it several times a week since and it works magnificently to reduce wrinkles, brighten skin around the eyes and treat puffiness in the occipital areas of the face. Let me tell you something, on the days I didn't use it I could tell a tremendous difference in the appearance of my face. I recommend this wonderful treatment to anyone getting over 35 in age. It will be a god send to you.

title: soft for my eyes
content: I'm always seeking the ultimate eye cream that works to get rid of puffy eyes. In my case it's age but mostly allergies causing water retention. By far this eye cream works better than anything else. It even worked to stop my right lid from sagging. It started working right away and continued to get better over a period of a couple of months and it seems to be restored to normal, however I do continue to use it everyday. It doesn't claim to work on sagging lids but it does. In fact, I've never found another eye cream that does. Evidently one or more ingredients is different than what's in most other eye creams.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
